isMsPunctuation

static boolean isMsPunctuation(java.lang.String ch)
Determines if a single-character String is a specially allowed MS punctuation character.
returns:
True if ch is a punctuation character.
Parameters:
ch - Character to examine.

isMsQuantityOrBreathing

static boolean isMsQuantityOrBreathing(java.lang.String ch)
Determines if a single-character String is a specially allowed MS quantity or breathing character.
returns:
True if ch is a quantity or breathing character.
Parameters:
ch - Character to examine.

isValidMsChar

static boolean isValidMsChar(java.lang.String ch)
Determines if a single-character String is allowed in the orthography of Greek manuscripts.
returns:
True if ch is a valid character.
Parameters:
ch - Character to examine.
